title: Grilled Cheese
description: An American staple. A buttery grilled sandwich with a melted cheese center.
recipe: Get bread. Get Cheese. Heat up pan. Put butter on bread. Put cheese on bread. Put sandwich in pan. Flip. Eat.

title: Kale Salad
description: This easy kale salad features fresh veggies and a super simple homemade lemon dressing, making it perfect as a healthy side dish or light lunch! It is definitely one of my very favorite kale salad recipes!
recipe: Massage kale. Grate parmesan. Chop almonds. Slice tomatoes.

title: Baked Salmon
description: Whether you need a fast, healthy dinner, a meal to wow the crowd, or a simple protein that you can enjoy tonight and eat leftover the next day, this is THE baked salmon recipe for you!
ingredients: salmon, lemon, chives, salt, pepper, dill
recipe: Combine juice from lemon with salt, pepper, chives, and dill. Spread onto salmon. Bake in oven for 25 minutes. Serve with additional chopped chives.

instructions.step: Combine juice from lemon with salt, pepper, chives, and dill.

title: Coq au Vin
description: Coq Au Vin or rooster with wine is a classic French dish that isn't as complicated as it sounds. Chicken is braised in a silky wine sauce and finished off with butter for the most perfect sauce.
ingredients: chicken, red wine, pearl onions, thyme, bay leaf, bacon, flour, beef stock, tomato paste, butter, mushrooms, parsley
recipe: Combine wine, bay leaf, thyme, beef stock, and pearl onions in a bowl. Marinate chicken in wine mixture. Sear chicken. In a 350 degree oven, roast chicken with bacon and flour.

instructions.step: Combine wine, bay leaf, thyme, beef stock, and pearl onions in a bowl
In a 350 degree oven, roast chicken with bacon and flour

title: Egg Fried Rice
description: This egg fried rice recipe is designed to work with any cooking setup, whether you're lucky enough to have a true flaming-hot wok burner or are just using a nonstick skillet on an electric cooktop.
ingredients: leftover rice, cooking oil, soy sauce, 4 eggs
recipe: Heat up oil in a wok. Add rice and soy sauce, stir to combine. Add in eggs. Leave on heat until eggs are cooked through.

instructions.step: Heat up oil in a wok
Add rice and soy sauce, stir to combine
Leave on heat until eggs are cooked through
